class.name: BTRandomWait
class.brief_description: BT action that waits for a randomized duration to pass and returns [code]SUCCESS[/code].
class.description: BT action that waits for a randomized duration to pass and returns [code]SUCCESS[/code]. The minimum wait time is defined by [code]duration_min_max.x[/code], and the maximum is defined by [code]duration_min_max.y[/code].
